oracle.mapviewer.share.stylex
Class VariablePieChartStyleModel

java.lang.Object
  oracle.mapviewer.share.style.AbstractStyleModel
      oracle.mapviewer.share.stylex.AbstractBucketStyleModel
          oracle.mapviewer.share.stylex.VariablePieChartStyleModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, StyleModel
public class VariablePieChartStyleModel
extends AbstractBucketStyleModel

Model class for MapViewer variable pie chart style. A variable pie chart style is a bucket style, and each bucket range is related with one size. The size of the pie chart for the first bucket corresponds to the initial size defined in this model, and the following bucket pie chart sizes will be incremented by the increment value defined in this model.

See Also:
Serialized Form
